Author: The Combat Reborn Team
Name: Rotation Solver Reborn
Description:
Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.

This means almost all the information available in one frame in combat, including the status of all players in the party, the status of any hostile targets, skill cooldowns, the MP and HP of characters, the location of characters, casting status of the hostile target, combo, combat duration, player level, etc.
Then, it will highlight the best action on the hot bar, or help you to click on it.
It is designed for `general combat`, not for savage or ultimate. Use it carefully.
Punchline: Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.
Changelog:
## What's Changed
* Centralize PvP Guard logic, add config, improve perf by @LTS-FFXIV in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/pull/1150


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/compare/7.4.0.42...7.4.0.43

Author: The Combat Reborn Team
Name: EasyZoom Reborn
Description: Easy zoom distance unlock and fov control. /ez opens the EasyZoomReborn configuration window.
Punchline: Easy zoom distance unlock and fov control. /ez opens the EasyZoomReborn configuration window.

Author: The Combat Reborn Team
Name: GatherBuddy Reborn
Description: Adds commands to simplify gathering by finding nodes and fish and their locations via item name and a UI to keep track of special uptime and weather conditions. Also automatically gathers items based on these conditions using lists that you specify. Automated gathering requires vnavmesh.
Punchline: Simplify Gathering and Fishing to the extreme.
Changelog:
## What's Changed
* Restore Anti-Pandora protection by @lazyranma in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/519
* Use mount action availability check instead of mount roulette by @lazyranma in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/515
* Remove wait for materia extraction confirmation dialog by @lazyranma in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/513
* feat: Add scrip reserve option for collectable purchases by @Luna-Salamanca in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/512
* Teleporting to Upcoming Nodes + Umbral and ActiveItemList Rework by @lazyranma in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/517
* Enable Diadem Umbral fish support by @lazyranma in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/522
* Collect overcap by @Deathbeyond87 in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/523

## New Contributors
* @Luna-Salamanca made their first contribution in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/512

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/compare/7.4.0.14...7.4.0.15
